ModMetaData.name: NeuTech - Advanced Medical Pod
ModMetaData.author: Neufusion
ModMetaData.description: .Using the latest medical technology from NeuTech, including Negative-Pressure Wound Therapy and Robotically-Assisted Surgery, the Advanced Medical Pod enhances the effectiveness of medical operations and accelerates the healing process. Does NOT induce cryptosleep. Connectable to Vitals Monitor.
